lyrics:

Your Empty walls
Pretentious attention

Don't waste your time
On coffins today
When we decline
From the coffins of our mind
Don't waste your time
On coffins today

Don't you see their bodies burning?
Desolate and full of yearning
Dying of anticipation
Choking from intoxication

Dying of anticipation
Choking from intoxication

Those empty walls
